img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled EVSC Lessons to Air on WNIN

a.title: EVSC Lessons to Air on WNIN

div.a: EVSC Lessons to Air on WNIN
div.div: Lessons Air on WNIN Monday - Friday ...

a.title: EVSC Lessons to Air on WNIN

div.a: Read More... about EVSC Lessons to Air on WNIN

div.div:
The EVSC is the third largest school district in the state of Indiana with an enrollment of almost 23,000 students and 3400 employees. The district is a county-wide system that is comprised of urban, suburban and rural areas. We have 40 schools, including five specialized schools, six specialized programs and a rapidly expanding early learning program.
Our approach to educating all students is GAIN (Growth in Academics through Innovation and Neuroeducation). GAIN is the umbrella that includes multiple initiatives to ensure students reach their maximum potential and are prepared to be successful throughout every stage of life. We are committed to educating the whole child by integrating academics with social emotional learning.
Building strong relationships and partnerships with local businesses allows us to work together to make our community a better place for students, families and employees.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
